## Leak Lock Release Notes

Cross‑IDE release with unified notes and shared tag.

### Artifacts
- VS Code extension (.vsix)
- Visual Studio VSIX
- IntelliJ plugin distribution (.zip)

### Highlights
- Dockerized Nosey Parker scanning (init → scan → report JSON)
- BFG-based git history cleanup with auto-generated replacements
- Consistent UI flow across IDEs (panel/tool window, results table, open file/line)
- Status bar indicator and toolbar actions (IntelliJ); Tools menu in Visual Studio
- Unified CI/CD with single shared tag and combined release assets

### Getting Started
- VS Code: install the VSIX or from Marketplace
- Visual Studio: install the attached VSIX
- IntelliJ: install the attached ZIP via Settings → Plugins → Install plugin from disk
